name: A Vine Connection
description:
Move the plants by joining them together with vines. Plants can only be moved when connected. 

So grow and move them to the goal!

Controls:
-Click and drag a plant to start drawing a vine.
-Drag the plants by draging the vine.
-Remove the vine by clicking on the plant pot.
-Reset the stage with 'R'.

Made for the GMTK2021
